articles.content: NASHVILLE, Tenn. (WKRN) More than 16,000 new unemployment claims were filed in Tennessee last week, the highest number since late July, according to data released Thursday morning by the Tennessee De… [+313 chars]

articles.author: Natasha Turak
articles.title: Oil prices expected to struggle despite Saudi cuts, but Goldman is more bullish than most - CNBC
articles.description: Goldman Sachs sees demand rebounding by March, with the arrival of warmer weather and increased vaccinations.
articles.content: Oil markets are in for more struggles this year despite a more than 5% boost to prices this week on news from OPEC+. The oil producer group, led by Saudi Arabia and Russia, announced that members wou… [+4042 chars]

articles.title: Family Video closing all stores, including 14 in the St. Louis region - STLtoday.com
articles.description: In all, more than 250 remaining stores nationwide are closing.
articles.content:
GLENVIEW, Ill. Family Video confirmed Tuesday it will permanently close all stores nationwide, including 14 in the St. Louis area.
